newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila C. Bank raises 5-day rrp rate to 11 pct.
newsitem.headline: Manila C. Bank raises 5-day rrp rate to 11 pct.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Friday it raised its borrowing rate on the five-day reverse repo to 11.0 from 10.25 percent.
The adjustment follows its lifitng late Wednesday its overnight borrowing rate by 0.75 percentage-point to 11 percent.
The Central Bank said it raised its rates as a pre-emptive move against peso speculation. Banks had been jittery over large dollar outflows from funds divesting from the local stock market.
The stock market had tumbled to a two-year low due to poor first quarter earnings and fears of a slump in the property sector.
